title: Zoom Transcript Integration
description:
Integrate with Zoom API for automatic transcript retrieval. Secondary integration (after Google Meet works).

## API Approach
- Webhook events: Zoom Webhooks (recording.transcript_completed)
- Get transcript: Recordings API (download VTT file)

## App Type & Scopes
Must use General App (not Server-to-Server OAuth):
- cloud_recording:read:list_recording_files
- recording:read:admin

## Tasks
- 2.1: Create Zoom Marketplace app (unlisted/internal)
- 2.2: Implement Zoom OAuth flow (separate from Google)
- 2.3: Store Zoom OAuth tokens per user (encrypted)
- 2.4: Create webhook endpoint for recording.transcript_completed
- 2.5: Implement transcript download from Zoom CDN
- 2.6: Parse Zoom VTT format to internal format
- 2.7: Auto-trigger session creation from Zoom transcript
- 2.8: UI for connecting/disconnecting Zoom account
- 2.9: Zoom connection status indicator
- 2.10: Integration tests with webhook simulation
- 2.11: Zoom integration guide for self-hosters

## Prerequisites for Users
- Zoom Cloud Recording enabled (not local recording)
- Audio transcript setting enabled in Zoom account
- Only host can initiate cloud recording

## Processing Time
Transcripts take ~2x meeting duration to process (30-min meeting = ~1 hour wait)

title: Google Meet Transcript Integration
description:
Integrate with Google Meet API for automatic transcript retrieval. Primary integration (before Zoom) since Google OAuth already exists.

## API Approach
- Subscribe to events: Google Workspace Events API v1
- Get transcript data: Meet REST API v2
- Event type: google.workspace.meet.transcript.v2.fileGenerated

## OAuth Scopes
- https://www.googleapis.com/auth/meetings.space.readonly
- https://www.googleapis.com/auth/meetings.space.created

## Tasks
- 1.1: Implement hybrid OAuth config (shared vs BYOC mode)
- 1.2: Extend Google OAuth to include Meet scopes
- 1.3: Set up Cloud Pub/Sub topic and subscription
- 1.4: Implement Workspace Events API subscription manager
- 1.5: Create Pub/Sub push handler for transcript events
- 1.6: Implement Meet REST API client for transcript fetch
- 1.7: Parse Meet transcript format to internal format
- 1.8: Auto-trigger session creation from transcript
- 1.9: UI for linking/unlinking Google Meet integration
- 1.10: Display pending transcripts and processing status
- 1.11: Integration tests with mock Pub/Sub
- 1.12: Self-hoster guide: BYOC OAuth setup (Internal mode)
- 1.13: SaaS guide: How transcript sync works

## Workspace Tier Requirement
Business Standard, Enterprise, or Education Plus (for transcript access)
